headline: Atmos Energy reinstated with a Buy at BofA
summary: BofA reinstated coverage of Atmos Energy (ATO) with a Buy rating and $156 price target Atmos stands out from peers as a high-quality gas local distribution company benefiting from high growth service areas, constructive regulatory jurisdictions, and a strong balance sheet, says the analyst, who believes the company can achieve above-average 14.4% rate base growth and a 7.4% EPS CAGR through 2029. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news
